auto_play:
Play the chart automatically
(DEBUG: can toggle midsong by pressing back [ESC or Backspace by default])
legacy_score: Gain score based purely on ratings instead of time, like old base game/psych
ghost_tapping: Does pressing a key with no hittable notes cause a miss?
downscroll: Make notes fall down instead of rising up
hitsound_volume:
How loud should the hitsounds be?
(0 to disable)
offset:
How early/late the music is
(for headsets/speakers with audio delay)

fps:
im sure you can guess
0 = No Limit (Can be intensive!)
vsync:
Enable or disable Vsync
If enabled, FPS will mostly be locked to refresh rate
basic_play: If checked, only the strum/notes will load with no stage elements
auto_pause: Should the game freeze once the window loses focus?
splash_sprite: Choose the note splash sprite you want
note_splashes: When should a Note Splash happen?
rating_cam:
Which camera should the ratings and combo appear on?

chart_grid: The default option for the "Show Chart Grid" in the chart editor
